title: Bug 35183DBCS: Set text generates Index of Bounds exception using 2.0 NLS language pack
description: Bug 35183DBCS: Set text generates Index of Bounds exception using 2.0 NLS language pack Driver: RC2Java : Sun Java 1.3.107OS: SolarisLanguage: jaJPI got errors in the .log file during launching the WB with NLS languagepackage, and WB did not launch.Steps1. Extract the eclipseSDK.zip2. WB startup failed.
OB: Launch the eclipse (./eclipse vm /......)Then I got the error dialog and got errors in the .log file.
SR: Extract the NLS Language package (eclipsenlsSDK2.0.x.zip) under the samedirectory3.
